/circle6 Advantages of institutional deliveries and risks involved in home deliveries.
/circle6 Advise the woman on where to go if an emergency arises, and how to arrange for 
transportation, money and blood donors in case of an emergency.
/circle6 Educate the woman and her family members on signs of labour and danger signs of 
obstetric complications.
/circle6 Emphasise the importance of seeking ANC and PNC.
/circle6 Advise on diet (nutrition) and rest.
